question: What is Fresible Music?
answer: Fresible Music is a digital music distribution platform that allows African creatives distribute their music on major online streaming platforms and earn royalties.

question: Why Fresible Music?
answer: At Fresible, we love music and we know you do. Over the past 6 years, we’ve been experimenting with the idea of music distribution and how we can help African creatives monetize their creativity. With this in mind, our creative team and our digital strategy team worked on Fresible Music. We currently have over 50 customers

question: How long does it take to release my music?
answer: Your song will go live on most platforms within 14-21 days. If you want a faster release, kindly contact our customer support or initiate a chat session.

question: Will Fresible Music take out of my royalties?
answer: No. You’ll keep 100% of everything you earn in royalties.

question: Is this a subscription based service?
answer: Yes.This is a subscription based service that allows you to distribute your music online. Subscription is done yearly.

question: What happens if I don't renew my subscription?
answer: Failure to renew your subscription every year will warrant thatwe take down your songs from the online stores where your music is listed. Also you won't be able to request for payout of your royalties until you renew your subscription.

question: Can I create more than one package?
answer: Absolutely YES.You can create as many packages as you want under one single account.

question: I will like to upload to notjustok, tooxclusive, naijaloaded, etc
answer: Kindly contact our customer support or initiate a chat session.

question: Do you allow local music distribution to Nigerian Blogs?
answer: Yes. Kindly contact our customer support or initiate a chat session.

question: How do I view my sales data & earnings?
answer: You can view your play data and earnings on your Fresible music account. Access the Earnings tab from your dashboard. You can filter to see how much you've earned.

question: Can I choose which stores my music is released on?
answer: Yes, you can pick which stores your music is sent to. We can release your music to hundreds of major online music stores, including but not limited to Spotify, iTunes, Apple Music, Amazon, Google Play, Deezer and Tidal.

question: How much does it cost todistribute with fresible?
answer: Fresible Music allows youto distribute as many songs as you want to all online stores from just N15,000 per year. Find details to our distribution packages here on our pricing page.

question: Will you Promotemy music?
answer: Our distribution service does not includepromotion. Promotional services are separate packages and are subject to approval.

question: Do I need to renew my subscription?
answer: Your releases are at risk of being taken down if you do not keep up with your subscription payment. However due to the amount of releases we have, the release will not automatically be taken down, so if you do wish for your release to be removed, please request a takedown via your Fresible account. If your subscription is not up to date you will not be able to make a settlement request for royalties.

question: How much is the minimum payout?
answer: You can request for payout via your Fresible Music dashboard. The minimum payout amount is N15,000.

question: How do I get Paid?
answer: We request for bank account details when creating your account. Your royalties will be paid directly once you request for payment

question: Do you charge for payout?
answer: We don't charge for payouts but bank transaction charges will be deductedfrom your payout. Our payment transactions are handled by Paystack. For more information on how much paystack charges, check www.paystack.com

question: How Long Does it take to get credited?
answer: Payment takes between 10-14 days before youraccount is credited.
